title: PE&Win10升级到1.0！末地更新来了！
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2016-11-13 11:23 编辑 


There comes a time in every Minecraft edition’s life when they evolve from being a mere percentage into a fully fledged number. For Pocket Edition and Windows 10 that time is almost here. 1.0 - The Ender Update is coming!
在每个Minecraft版本生涯中，版本号从一个纯粹的小数慢慢变成一个完全成熟的数字。 PE版和Wi10版已经到时候了。 1.0 -末地更新来了！

We didn’t pick that number for the lols. Our next update is packed with features but most significant is probably The End and its iconic inhabitant - The Ender Dragon. Though you can carry on playing after defeating the misunderstood beast, for many, taking it down is the ultimate goal in Minecraft. Something to aim for and achieve after hours of play. A tangible end-game for Survival players.
我们没有继续把版本号延续下去。 我们的下一个更新有不少功能，但最重要的可能是末地和其标志性的居民——末影龙。 虽然你击败末影龙后还可以继续玩下去，但对许多人来说，击败末影龙将是一个“终极目标”。 经过数小时的游戏实现某些目标，这才是生存玩家的意义。

Of course, we’ll continue to update Pocket Edition and the Windows 10 Edition beta after this update. There’s plenty more to come!
当然，我们还会在这次更新后继续更新PE版和Win10版，还有更多的好东西！

Also, FYI, this is the update that the Apple TV Edition will ship with when it releases. Why not begin at The End, eh?
哦对了，顺便通知你下，这也是苹果电视版更新时将附带的版本。 为什么不在末地（结束）开始呢？对吧。

Alongside The End we’re also increasing the world height to 256 blocks. If you ask me, a 256 block-high building is a silly, silly thing but I suffer from mild vertigo so take from that what you will. You also get the snazzy new Elytra, known to the average human as “wings”. They’ll give you a whole new perspective on your Minecraft worlds as you float around free as a bird. A bird who can’t fly upwards but is super good at gliding.
普通世界和末日的高度已经增加到256。 好吧我告诉你，256方块高的建筑是愚蠢的。 你还有时髦的新鞘翅，普通人称为“翅膀”。 它会给你一个全新的角度来观看自己，像鸟儿一样自由漂浮。 不能向高处飞，但可以滑翔。

There are a lot more features in the new update but we’re not going to go into those right now. We think it would be more fun if you find them out yourselves.
这次更新还有很多功能，但我们现在不会说出来， 我们认为如果你自己发现会更有趣点。

Oh, and Android users get to test out the beta for themselves! If you’re playing on an Android device, sign up here and get testing. Remember though - betas mean we’re still working on the update so expect bugs and weirdness. Tell us if you spot ‘em and let us know what you think here.
哦，Android用户快去测试测试 ! 如果你是Android设备, 在这里测试。 记住——测试的意思是我们仍然在更新所以我们在期待bug和古怪的东西。 如果你发现它们，在这里告诉我们。

Thanks for sticking with us, everyone, no matter which platform you play on! Big congratulations to Pocket and Windows 10 for reaching the big 1.0. And sorry for sending millions of grizzled players into your home, Ender D. We love you really.谢谢你们的坚持，每个人都是！不管你在玩哪个平台！祝贺PE版和Windows 10版到达1.0版本！ 顺便，抱歉了，末影龙，数以百万的头发斑白的玩家将进入你的家园，我们真的很爱你。

replies.author: pikebet
replies.txt_content:
TangYJ_ing 发表于 2016-11-14 21:01
hypixel我都是直連的= =
这。还下不来？去百度上搜一下，我以前好像有2个服务没打开也下不来（被360识别为开机慢。。。）

replies.author: pikebet
replies.txt_content:
TangYJ_ing 发表于 2016-11-14 21:01
hypixel我都是直連的= =
找到答案了：您好！
在开始按钮点击右键，选择 计算机管理 在左边栏找到 服务和应用程序→服务，在右边服务中找到 Internet Connection Sharing，双击打开（如上图②），在“启动类型”中选择“ 自动”，并 启动该服务，单击“确定“，找到 Windows Firewall，双击打开，在“启动类型”中选择“ 自动”，并启动该服务，单击“确定”。
